descriptionHtml:
This is just something I created in Blender. I always felt that the Thalmor robes were a little underrated in Skyrim. I mean, high elves are supposed to be master's of magic and yet walk around with such under powered robes. All I did was alter the look a little and added them to the crafting list.
I have also made an obtainable set that has an enchantment I felt fitting to the robes and is also craftable. Any of these robes requires elven smithing and the enchanted set requires elven smithing and arcane blacksmithing. Also works with both female and male bodies. The helmet with mask is not beast race compatible but there is a hood for them.

This file is a Nexus exclusive, under no circumstance is it to be uploaded elsewhere.

Also, this mod contains altered meshes and textures from this mod:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26720/?

I have gotten permission from Natterforme to us his meshes, so if you want to alter this mod and upload it, you will need permission from Natte and myself.

Hope you enjoy these as much as I do,

Cheers!
author: ScrollThief1984
